user.description: User details including ID, username, email, first name, last name, avatar, and organization membership.

notification.description: If true, the user has notifications enabled.

termsOfUseConsent.description: If true, the user has accepted the terms of use.

marketingConsent.description: If true, the user has consented to marketing communications.

lastAccess.description: Timestamp of the user's last access.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the user was last updated.

deleted.description: If true, the user has been deleted.

user.title: UserResponseDto
